title: Annual Navam Perahara of Gangarama Temple parades the streets
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix By : Nalin Hewapathirana) The city of Colombo was transformed under the weight of 100 colourful elephants with vibrant colours, sounds and sights last night when the Navam Perahara of the Gangarama Temple paraded the streets the day before the Navam Full Moon Day on 16 February 2011….
